channel.title: Comments on: Banana Guard – I Always Wanted To Protect My Banana. No… Seriously
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
I don't know... it just seems stupid to me. I mean - you can just put the banana in a small box or something.
Good find with the header. I still don't understand how it got to BananaGuard. But then again... I don't understand BananaGuard.
item.content:encoded:
I don’t know… it just seems stupid to me. I mean – you can just put the banana in a small box or something.

Good find with the header. I still don’t understand how it got to BananaGuard. But then again… I don’t understand BananaGuard.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
Why is it stupid?
As for your question: Maybe they took their html header from here... http://www.clearspeed.com/acceleration/why/problem/
I mean maybe same programmer did both Web sites (and added a '-', hell knows why)
item.content:encoded:
Why is it stupid?

As for your question:
Maybe they took their html header from here…
http://www.clearspeed.com/acceleration/why/problem/

I mean maybe same programmer did both Web sites
(and added a ‘-‘, hell knows why)
